member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.Commit
member.summary: Commits all changes for the image and closes the stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.CreateNewFrame
member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to the new instance of an .
Optional. Receives the named properties to use for subsequent frame initialization. See Remarks.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.GetContainerFormat
member.param: A pointer that receives the encoder's container format GUID.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.GetEncoderInfo
member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to an .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.GetMetadataQueryWriter
member.summary: Retrieves a metadata query writer for the encoder.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the encoder's metadata query writer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the encoder with an which tells the encoder where to encode the bits.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.SetColorContexts
member.summary: Sets the objects for the encoder.
member.param: A pointer an pointer containing the color contexts to set for the encoder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.SetPalette
member.summary: Sets the global palette for the image.
member.param: The to use as the global palette.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.
Returns WINCODEC_ERR_UNSUPPORTEDOPERATION if the feature is not supported by the encoder.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.SetPreview
member.summary: Sets the global preview for the image.
member.param: The to use as the global preview.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.
Returns WINCODEC_ERR_UNSUPPORTEDOPERATION if the feature is not supported by the encoder.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder.SetThumbnail
member.summary: Sets the global thumbnail for the image.
member.param: The to set as the global thumbnail.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.
Returns WINCODEC_ERR_UNSUPPORTEDOPERATION if the feature is not supported by the encoder.

member.name: IWICBitmapEncoder
member.summary: Defines methods for setting an encoder's properties such as thumbnails, frames, and palettes.
